title: Extra Loss
body: So I am in my gold series for a second time now. Of course, I get a free win from reaching it for the second time. I just played a game and lost but when I looked at my ranked it says that I have 1 win and 2 losses? The only possible reason I could see is from me dodging a champion select because one of the players was already toxic, but why would I get a loss for that? If anyone has anything that could help me it would be much appreciated.

replies.body: If you [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) that will counts as a loss.   It will be marked a a lost match and also disqualification any promo helper assistance.  You don't have to communicate with others through chat in-game, so feel free to /mute all at any time and stick to[ smart pings](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752974-Smart-Ping).  Best of luck in your next series!

The thing is, I always say a nice greeting to everyone just to start off on a good note. So in the pre-game chat I said "How's everyone doing" and I got "shut  the hell up pussy" as a reply. I try my best to steer away from anyone like this so I dodged. I have a screen shot aswell.
